title: Custom Games Problem
body:
I have two questions (specifically for Riot).

1) How come "All Random" has been removed from the custom game types?

2) Why is URF unavailable for custom games this time around?

replies.body:
Hey summoner!

ARURF was bugged for custom games during testing. So instead of delaying URF until they could fix it, **Riot** decided to just release URF without the custom game option this time. Check out the full explanation [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/VpQIYfVz-arurf-custom-games-disabled-due-to-bug?show=nested).

I'm too sure about ARAM being disabled though. I asked a few of my **Riot** support contacts and they weren't too sure either. It's most likely a bug as well.
